Time and power was all it needed... for now. Wha=
t had been just a mere spark of a light was now glowing and vibrant. Reachi=
ng out to figure out how to respond and command a new body, now finally rid=
 of that pathetic organic form. Starting anew was not so bad. 

Reaching ou=
t through the vast maze that was the computer and various electronical form=
s... she did her best to "urge" what Decepticon that was nearby to help. Pe=
rhaps do her bidding. Oh, yes. One that would do her bidding would be very =
nice. Seek out what materials be needed to construct a new form - a form fa=
r more powerful than before she was merged into that sad techno-organic for=
m. 

Attempting to sound distant, restained, and helpless... a child or wom=
an lost in time and space, any way to get someone to pay attention, prefera=
bly a Decepticon-
Maybe that being with rescued her from nearly extinquishi=
ng? 

"help," rang out ever so softly, weak and helpless it sounded. 
Whate=
ver it was that helped her then, rescued her would hear her now. She was be=
ing helped moreso by technology. Her spark could call out. 

"someone... pl=
ease... help."
